name: tribble-sdk-monorepo
description: Tribble Platform SDK - Enterprise-grade extension framework for building tools, integrations, cartridges, and ingest adapters

scripts.build: npm run build:extensions && npm run build:core && npm run build:enhanced && npm run build:sdk && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:extensions: npm run -w @tribble/sdk-extensions build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-capabilities build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-test build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-policy build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-control build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-primitives build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-runner build
scripts.build:core: npm run -w @tribble/sdk-core build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-agent build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-ingest build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-workflows build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-events build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-auth build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-queue build
scripts.build:enhanced: npm run -w @tribble/sdk-offline build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-structured build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-conversations build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-telemetry build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-prompts build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-batch build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-react build
